content: come on take it take another little piece of my heart scrapghan blanket love comes in all shapes and sizes like on this crochet blanket adorned with heart-shaped motifs stitched in red heart super saver you ll create colorful motifs separately then assemble them to complete your throw practice granny squares color changes assembly slip_stitch flat seaming and more a warm heirloom piece it s a thoughtful way to show someone how much you care
